enchantment.travelanchors.teleportation_: Increases the teleportation range with each tier
tooltip.travelanchors.travel_anchor_bloc: To teleport look at it while standing on another anchor
Also, you can teleport to it by holding Travel Staff
tooltip.travelanchors.travel_staff: Look at Travel Anchor to warp
tooltip.travelanchors.travel_staff_secon: Shift + Right-Click to short range Teleport
travelanchors.lock.locked: This anchor is now locked. Use Shift + Right-Click with empty hand to unlock
travelanchors.lock.unlocked: This anchor is no longer locked
travelanchors.mimic.cant_use: This block can't be used as mimic for anchor
